snippet: Thaddeus Young posted his 22nd double-double of the season, but the Nets, who trailed by 62-43 at halftime, lost their fifth straight.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat Brooklyn Nets, 114-100.
lead_paragraph: Thaddeus Young posted his 22nd double-double of the season, but the Nets, who trailed by 62-43 at halftime, lost their fifth straight.

headline.print_headline: Nets Mount Third-Quarter Charge but Fall to Pacers
headline.main: Nets Mount Third-Quarter Charge but Fall to Pacers
